scripts.dev:
docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yaml up -d --build && echo "
************************************************
* Started development server on localhost:8080 *
************************************************
"
scripts.stop-dev:
docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yaml down && echo "
****************************
* Ended development server *
****************************
"
scripts.prod:
docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yaml up -d --build && echo "
###############################################
# Started production server on localhost:8080 #
###############################################
"
scripts.stop-prod:
docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yaml down && echo "
###########################
# Ended production server #
###########################
"
